data_tip: (Data on this page is within 7 days and is updated every 30 seconds)
submit_desc:
To add a new project to HotCoinList, please fill out the form below carefully.
We will review the information after you complete your submission and the project page will be available after review.
After your project has received more than 500 likes, your project will be searchable.
When your project is in the top 20 likes within 7 days, your project will be listed in the "Hottest Coins".
